summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, copied to the lead FBI Special Agent on the Epstein investigation. The email coordinates the transfer of materials related to the investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating the transfer of materials related to the Epstein investigation to the recipient and copying the lead FBI agent.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 16, 2020, indicating ongoing coordination in the Epstein investigation after his death.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in coordinating the receipt of materials.
The lead FBI Special Agent on the Epstein investigation is copied on the correspondence, showing inter-agency collaboration.
The correspondence concerns the transfer of unspecified materials related to the Epstein investigation.
The email originates from St. Andrew's Plaza, a known location for federal offices in New York.
